title: Easy USB Creator 2.1
description:
Easy USB Creator 2.1

Size: 0.3 MB

Requires: Win All

Easy USB Creator is a standalone utility for quickly converting ISO images into bootable USB sticks. With a single click, it can turn Windows setup DVDs and various recovery utilities (such as our own Easy Recovery Essentials for Windows) into bootable USB drives that can be used to install or recover Windows on the go.

Easy USB Creator runs on all versions of Microsoft Windows, and currently supports the creating bootable USBs of the following versions of Windows:

    Windows XP
    Windows Vista
    Windows 7
    Windows 8
    Windows 10
    Windows Server 2003
    Windows Server 2008
    Windows Server 2012

Easy USB Creator can also create bootable USB sticks for recovery utilities and repair environments. Support for creating bootable jump drives from Linux setup ISO images is coming soon.



What's NEW:


    [USB-9] - Exclude network drives from list
    [USB-10] - Support .NET 2.0 and .NET 4.0 simultaneously
    [USB-12] - Implement checking for and validating against md5sum.txt
    [USB-13] - Attempt to take ownership of (boot) files before deleting/overwriting

How to:

* Open it (with winzip/winrar)!

* Just Run to use ( Portable Application )
